hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the final item you're looking for can be found somewhere in Hyrule.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Water Temple#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Raised Island Courtyard Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #Barinade#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Zora Scale#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb East Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #2# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mirror Shield#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #Dodongo's Cavern#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #Morpha#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #ReDead in the royal tomb# guard #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Central Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Water Temple#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Map of the Ice Cavern#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Kokiri Sword#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block First Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Big Lava Room Lower Open Door Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Hylian Shield# and #an Ice Cavern Compass#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #an Ocarina#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple After Wind Enemy Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #3# major items.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: What do you call a group of Gorons?^${12 39 C7}A rock band.

SFM (Saria).text: Did you know that Blue Fire destroys mud walls and detonates Bomb Flowers?

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #a Red Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Water Temple#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Map of the Ice Cavern#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mirror Shield#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.
